alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 17 at 10:50AM EST until January 18 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as the upper 20s can be expected. * WHERE...Echols, Clinch, Northeastern Charlton, Southern Ware and Western Charlton Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 8 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Echols; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
